text: Astrid Skare (17 January 1891 - 18 November 1963) was a Norwegian politician for the Labour Party. She was born in Beitstad. She was elected to the Norwegian Parliament from Buskerud in 1945, and was re-elected on two occasions. ==References== * Category:1891 births Category:1963 deaths Category:Labour Party (Norway) politicians Category:Members of the Storting Category:Women members of the Storting Category:20th-century Norwegian women politicians Category:20th-century Norwegian politicians Category:People from Steinkjer
title: Astrid Skare
